improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero.  The value of x becomes 0 after the loop completes, leading to a runtime error when calculating y = 1 / x. Add a check to ensure x is not 0 before the division operation.
The loop always executes 10 times, causing x to reach 0. This leads to the division by zero issue. Review the loop logic and consider the intended behavior when x becomes 0.
